Functions

  • std::auto_ptr< DataBuffer > encrypt (const char *key, const DataBuffer &data)
    Encrypts a databuffer using blowfish crypt with cbc and puts a generated iv vector as the first 8 bytes in the final encrypted data.
  • std::auto_ptr< DataBuffer > decrypt (const char *key, const DataBuffer &data)
    Decrypts a databuffer using blowfish crypt with cbc and reads iv vector as the first 8 bytes in the encrypted data.
  • std::auto_ptr< DataBuffer > encrypt (const char *key, const char *iv, const DataBuffer &data)
    Encrypts a databuffer using blowfish crypt with cbc.
  • std::auto_ptr< DataBuffer > decrypt (const char *key, const char *iv, const DataBuffer &data)
    Decrypts a databuffer using blowfish crypt with cbc.
  • MC2String encrypt (const MC2String &key, const vector< char > &iv, const MC2String &str)

Decrypts a databuffer using blowfish crypt with cbc.

Parameters:
key a password
iv initialization vector

Returns:
pointer to encrypted databuffer

std::auto_ptr<DataBuffer> decrypt (  const char *  key,
const DataBuffer &  data
) 
 

Decrypts a databuffer using blowfish crypt with cbc and reads iv vector as the first 8 bytes in the encrypted data.

Parameters:
key the password
data encrypted data that shall be decrypted
Returns:
pointer to decrypted databuffer
